original_text: Then David rested with his ancestors and was buried in the City of David.
korean_text: 다윗이 그의 조상들과 함께 누워 다윗 성에 장사되니

sentences.original_text: Then David rested with his ancestors
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 다윗은 그의 조상들과 함께 안식하였고

sentences.original_text: and was buried in the City of David
